column9: We decided to come and try the pizza with Mozzarella di Bufala. When we got there, we unpleasantly discovered that pizza was actually served with goat cheese instead and other ingredients. Just terrible. We ended taking "Quattro stagione", which was as you can expect neither...More

column7: Good burger after a long day working
column9: Ok, I am usually not the "eat at the hotel" kinda guy. But having worked at the local business park and nothing close by (except for going with an often overcharging cab), this was the place to go. And it did a good job! Good...More
